p: Retention indices of the volatile components of Soo were determined by the Kovats method using n -alkanes (C 6 –C 32 ) as standards [23–27].Volatile compounds were identified by comparison with literature RI [28–36]and MS, compared to existing analytical standards, and by matching mass spectral libraries (NIST, Wiley7NL, FFNSC1.2, and W9N11).
